welcome_message_body: Welcome to Salisbury, a charming city known for its rich history, breathtaking architecture, and picturesque countryside. We invite you to explore and experience all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upavon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bournemouth International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bournemouth International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southampton Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Southampton Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
